data_key.title: data_key
data_key.description: Describes the objects in the data property of Event documents

dtype.description: The type of the data in the event.

external.description: Where the data is stored if it is stored external to the events.

shape.description: The shape of the data.  Empty list indicates scalar data.

dims.description: The names for dimensions of the data. Null or empty list if scalar data

source.description: The source (ex piece of hardware) of the data.

fields.description: The 'interesting' data keys for this device.

timestamps.description: The timestamps of the individual measurement data

data_keys.description: This describes the data stored alongside it in this configuration object.
This describes the data in the Event Documents.
data_keys.title: data_keys

dk_sub_image.description: the array of dark dark subtracted image

mask.description: the array of mask where 0 is good pixel and 1 is bad pixel

chi_Q.description: the array of momentum transfer Q in azimuthal integration result I(Q)

chi_I.description: the array of intensity in I azimuthal integration result I(Q)

chi_max.description: the maximum value of I in azimuthal integration result I(Q)

chi_argmax.description: the value of Q at the maximum I in azimuthal integration result I(Q)

iq_Q.description: the array of momentum transfer Q in the cropped and interpolated I(Q)

iq_I.description: the array of intensity I in the cropped and interpolated I(Q)

sq_Q.description: the array of momentum transfer Q in the structure factor S(Q)

sq_S.description: the array of intensity I in the structure factor S(Q)

fq_Q.description: the array of momentum transfer Q in the reduced structure factor F(Q)

fq_F.description: the array of intensity I in the reduced structure factor F(Q)

gr_r.description: the array of atomic pair distance r in the reduced pair distribution function G(r)

gr_G.description: the array of pair distribution function G in the reduced pair distribution function G(r)

gr_max.description: the maximum value of G in the reduced pair distribution function G(r)

gr_argmax.description: the value of r at the maximum of G in the reduced pair distribution function G(r)

uid.description: Globally unique ID for this event descriptor.
uid.title: uid

run_start.description: Globally unique ID of this run's 'start' document.

time.description: Creation time of the document as unix epoch time.

object_keys.description: Maps a Device/Signal name to the names of the entries it produces in data_keys.

name.description: A human-friendly name for this data stream, such as 'primary' or 'baseline'.

configuration.description: Readings of configurational fields necessary for interpreting data in the Events.

title: event_descriptor
description: Document to describe the data captured in the associated event documents
